sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"sysops"}}>{`SysOps`}</MDXTag>
{/* TOC */}
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#sysops"}}>{`SysOps`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#networking"}}>{`Networking`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#networking-bottlenecks"}}>{`Networking Bottlenecks`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#dns-101"}}>{`DNS 101`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#top-level-domains"}}>{`Top Level Domains`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#domain-registrars"}}>{`Domain Registrars`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#soa-records"}}>{`SOA Records`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#ns-records"}}>{`NS Records`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#a-records"}}>{`A Records`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#ttl-record"}}>{`TTL Record`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#cnames"}}>{`CNAMES`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#alias-records"}}>{`Alias records`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#summary"}}>{`Summary`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#registering-a-domain-name"}}>{`Registering a Domain Name`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#definitions"}}>{`Definitions`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
{/* /TOC */}
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"networking"}}>{`Networking`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"networking-bottlenecks"}}>{`Networking Bottlenecks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Increase network performance = increase instance size.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`EBS Throughput != network throughput. This is writing to disk as opposed to EC2 talking to each other within the same subnet.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"dns-101"}}>{`DNS 101`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`DNS is used to convert human friendly domains to an `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Internet Protocol (IP)`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`IPv4 is a 32 bit field and has 42 billion addresses.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`IPv6 has an address space of 128 bits. 340 undecillion addresses.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The big issue at the moment is that everyone is still using IPv4 - this is driven by ISPs.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Amazon previously did not have IPv6 support for backend systems. This changed around 2016.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"top-level-domains"}}>{`Top Level Domains`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The last word in the domain name is the top level eg. `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.com`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.edu`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.gov`}</MDXTag>{` etc.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`These are controlled by the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Internet Assigne Numbers Authority (IANA)`}</MDXTag>{` in a root zone database which is essentially a database of all available top level domains.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"domain-registrars"}}>{`Domain Registrars`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`As all of these need to be unique, the domain registrar is an authority that can assign domain names directly under one or more top-level domains. These domains are registered with InterNIC, a service of ICANN, which enforces the uniqueness of domain names across the internet.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Each domain becomes registered in a central database known as the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`WhoIS database`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"soa-records"}}>{`SOA Records`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Start of Authority`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Name of the server that suppised the data for the zone.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`The administrator of the zone. (The owner)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Current version of the data file`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Number of seconds a secondary name server should wait before checking for updates etc.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Default TTL file on resource records`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"ns-records"}}>{`NS Records`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Name Server records`}</MDXTag>{` - used by `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Top Level Domain`}</MDXTag>{` servers to direct traffic to the Content DNS server which contains the authoritative DNS records.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"a-records"}}>{`A Records`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The "A" record is the fundamental type of DNS record. It stands for "Address". The A record is use by a computer to translate the name of the domain to the IP address.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"ttl-record"}}>{`TTL Record`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Time to Live`}</MDXTag>{` - the length of time that the DNS server is cached either on the server or you PC.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`DNS records take time to propagate throughout the internet. Companies before a migration, they will drop the TTL down low. You may find that even two days later, at the time of the migration the DNS resolutions can head to the old or new server.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"cnames"}}>{`CNAMES`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Canonical Name (CNAME)`}</MDXTag>{` can be used to resolve one domain name to another. For example, you may have a mobile website with the domain name `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`http://m.acloud.guru`}</MDXTag>{` that is used for when users browse to your domain name on their mobile devices. You may also want `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`http://mobile.acloud.guru`}</MDXTag>{` to resolve to the same address.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"alias-records"}}>{`Alias records`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`AWS specific. It is used to map resource record sets in your hosted zone to things like ELBs, CF distributions or S3 buckets.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The difference, a CNAME can't be used for naked domain names (zone apex).`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"summary"}}>{`Summary`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`ELBs do not have a pre-defined IPv4 address - you need to resolve it using a DNS name.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Understand the difference between an Alias Record and a CNAME.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Given the choose, always choose an Alias Record over a CNAME. (No charge with Alias Record either)`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"registering-a-domain-name"}}>{`Registering a Domain Name`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Head to Route 53, select `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Register a Domain`}</MDXTag>{` and go through the process of adding the domain to the cart and continue.`}</MDXTag>
